name: Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk / ルフランの地下迷宮と魔女ノ旅団
description: Beneath a small town lies an endless maze known as the Labyrinth of Refrain. Dusk Witch Dronya arrives, and with her puppet soldiers, endeavors to find something buried deep within. Embark on an adventure as you discover the secrets underground.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit Processor: Intel i5-6500 3.2GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
